page.title: 10FAMILY PETS IN DARLINGTON
page.content: We have completed a survey on domestic pets,and have discovered that pets are very popular to keep. Children between the ages of ten and eleven keep the most pets.Rabbits and rodents are owned by 50% of this age group,fish are next with 27%. For the seven to eight age group,fish are also favourites for pets,and so are dogs. 29.8% of the school own dogs.Dogs are intelligent, good tempered and loving, so when given a choice of pets,3 in 10 persons choose a dog.However,dogs need a lot of attention and exercise which is probably why one in five persons own fish.These pets brighten up a dull room with their attractive colours, and are easy to care for.
